mapper.select: SELECT grouplist_number, grouplist_name, grouplist_introduce, grouplist_interest, grouplist_people, grouplist_date FROM bumoim.grouplist
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bumoim.grouplist ( grouplist_name, grouplist_introduce, grouplist_interest, grouplist_people, grouplist_date ) VALUES ( #{grouplist_name}, #{grouplist_introduce}, #{grouplist_interest}, #{grouplist_people}, CURDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, member_photo as fileName, member_number as member_studentId, member_name, member_major as member_department FROM member WHERE member_group1 = #{grouplist_number} || member_group2 = #{grouplist_number} || member_group3 = #{grouplist_number}
